meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bulky.
meanings.sent1: The bulkiness of the package made it difficult to carry.
meanings.sent2: The elephant's bulkiness made it stand out in the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The bulkiness of the snowman's nose made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her suitcase's bulkiness was like a giant rock in her hands.
meanings.sent5: The bulkiness of the old TV made it hard to move around.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a large size or volume.
meanings.sent1: The bulkiness of the furniture filled the room completely.
meanings.sent2: The ship's bulkiness made it seem invincible on the water.
meanings.sent3: The bulkiness of the cake surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The mountain's bulkiness against the sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The bulkiness of the tree trunk made it impossible to move alone.
